description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for managing wishlists within a web application. It provides CRUD operations for wishlists and their items, using Spring annotations for routing and documentation. The class interacts with a WishlistService to perform business logic.

classes.name: WishlistController
classes.description: REST controller providing endpoints for wishlist management, including listing, creation, deletion, item addition/removal, setting target prices, and toggling notifications.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists the current user's wishlists by invoking wishlistService.list.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new wishlist with the provided name for the current user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a wishlist identified by wishlistId for the current user.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds an item to a wishlist, specified by productId in the payload.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes an item from a wishlist based on itemId.

methods.name: targetPrice
methods.description: Sets a target price for an item in a wishlist.

methods.name: toggleNotifications
methods.description: Placeholder endpoint for toggling wishlist-level notifications; currently no real implementation.
